show_name: Locke the Superman: New World Command (OAV)
other_title: Locke the Superman: New World Battle Team
超人ロック: 新世界戦隊 (Japanese)
plot: 3 men and 2 women have amnesia. They are selected to meet up and join up as a group. They are all ESP'ers with different powers that sublement each other. They are given the mission to save the human race. Once completed they will get their memory back. The go on the mission and travel accross the universe to complete it.
